        Demanded demonstration of functionality for block 3 by using the given countingSort example using both a Reader and an InputStream

      • removeCommentsAndBlankLines

        private static void removeCommentsAndBlankLines(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> lines)
        Given an ArrayList of Strings where each string is a line of text, this method removes all lines from the list that are either empty("") or contain a '#' character(which means that line is a comment)

      • createMachine

        public static TuringMachine<java.lang.Character> createMachine(java.lang.String data)
                                                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a TuringMachine based on the configuration given as a String.
        Parameters:
        data - The configuration read in from a file as a string
        Returns:
        a fully configured TuringMachine. Plug'n'Play!
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - in case the provided configuration data has errors in it like formatting errors for example.

      • getLine

        private static java.lang.String getLine(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> lines,
                       int index,
                       boolean remove)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the element with the given index of the arrayList if it exists. If not an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        lines - The arrayList from which an element should be extracted and returned
        index - the index of the element in the arrayList to get
        remove - whether to remove the element from the arrayList
        Returns:
        the element of the arrayList with the given index, if it exists
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if no element with the given index exists in the arrayList

      • addTransition

        private static void addTransition(TuringMachine<java.lang.Character> machine,
                 java.lang.String line)
                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds a transition to the given machine. The data for the Transition is provided as a string that contains one line of a configuration-file that contains transition data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - in case the provided configuration data has errors in it like formatting errors for example.

      • getInt

        private static int getInt(java.lang.String string)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parses a string to an int.
        Returns:
        the integer value of the string, if parsing was successful
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if parsing was not successful

                                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a TuringMachine based on the configuration given as an InputStream.
        Parameters:
        input - InputStream pointing to the Configuration file
        Returns:
        a fully configured TuringMachine. Plug'n'Play!
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - in case the provided configuration data has errors in it like formatting errors for example.
